thread.title: Bieber's 'ex' Sahara Ray flashes pierced nipples
thread.title_full: Justin Bieber's 'ex' Sahara Ray flashes pierced nipples | Daily Mail Online

author: Jo Scrimshire For Daily Mail Australia
title: Bieber's 'ex' Sahara Ray flashes pierced nipples
text:
She's the Australian model known for THAT infamous skinny dipping holiday with pop star Justin Bieber in August.
And it looks like Sahara Ray is still quite the exhibitionist despite enjoying a chilly winter holiday in Aspen, Colorado.
The 23-year-old beauty shared an Instagram photo on Tuesday of herself in a lacy red ensemble which revealed her pierced nipples.
Feeling nippy? Justin Bieber's 'ex-fling' Sahara Ray flashed her pierced nipples under a lace red top on holiday in Aspen, Colorado on Tuesday - as temperatures fell to six degrees
Sahara, the daughter of surfer Tony Ray, went braless under a sheer outfit featuring lace cut-outs across the chest and arms.
Her bare breasts were visible as she struck a sultry pose by a log cabin against the backdrop of a picturesque snowy hill.
She certainly did not dress for the weather, as temperatures in the popular skiing resort dropped to six degrees on Tuesday.
She's an exhibitionist! The 23-year-old bikini designer is well-known for flaunting her busty figure on Instagram as she travels the world with her friends
The bikini designer is well-known for flaunting her busty figure on Instagram as she travels the world with her friends.
One of her most famous trips resulted in a skinny dipping session with Justin Bieber in Hawaii, which was caught on camera.
It is unclear if they were dating during the 'holiday romance' and Sahara has not yet spoken publicly about the incident.
Did they have a fling? One of Sahara's most famous trips resulted in a skinny dipping session (pictured) with pop star Justin Bieber in Hawaii, which was caught on camera
Fun in the sun! It is unclear if Sahara and Justin (R) were dating during the 'holiday romance' and she has not yet spoken publicly about the incident
She was previously linked to Gold Coast singer Cody Simpson after they were seen kissing outside an LA nightclub in October 2015.
Meanwhile, Sahara recently attracted controversy by posting an Instagram selfie after undergoing rumoured lip fillers.
Her notably plump pout resulted in a fan backlash, with some followers even comparing her appearance to a Bratz doll.
Famous exes: Sahara was previously linked to Gold Coast singer-songwriter Cody Simpson after they were seen kissing outside an LA nightclub in October 2015
